description: Consulted from seed stage on business strategy, technical architecture, and market positioning. TouchCast was later acquired for $500M, validating the strategic foundation and technical roadmap developed during early-stage consulting.

Innovation consulting for Salesforce Ignite program. Developed human-first LLM platform for disaster response coordination, focusing on resilient communication infrastructure and AI-assisted emergency management systems.

Conducted comprehensive security assessment and business model development for emerging fintech platform. Provided strategic guidance on security architecture, regulatory compliance, and market positioning.
Security and regulation-focused consulting project (confidential). Advised on complex regulatory compliance frameworks and security risk mitigation strategies for enterprise client.
Led innovation consulting workshop for American Express OPEN team, focusing on emerging payment technologies, fraud prevention, and customer experience optimization for small business segment.
Consulted on Japanese venture market entry strategy, providing guidance on technology ecosystem dynamics, partnership development, and cultural considerations for successful market penetration.
Strategic advisor for AI/VR startup, providing guidance on technology development, security architecture, market positioning, and strategic partnerships in emerging immersive technology sector.
